channel.title: base64 on Ibiza
channel.description: Recent content in base64 on Ibiza

item.title: Ubuntu에서 Base64로 인코딩, 디코딩하기
item.description: Encode echo로 입력하기 $ echo "password" | base64 cGFzc3dvcmQK Control+D를 누를때까지 입력하기 $ base64 admin password ^D # Control+D # result YWRtaW4KcGFzc3dvcmQK Decode echo로 입력하기 $ echo "cGFzc3dvcmQK" | base64 --decode password Control+D를 누를때까지 입력하기 $ base64 --decode YWRtaW4KcGFzc3dvcmQK ^D # Control+D # result admin password
